title: Un minion como campeon
body:
We need a minion champ/necesitamos un campeón minion talvez
** Nombre: "Musi"**
**-habilidades:**
**Pasiva:** Los súbditos aliados cercanos a "Musi" se ven motivados por su liderazgo, lo que hace que entren en fragor durante la batalla aumentadon sus stats(respectivo asu tipo) en 1/3/6. a mayor números de minions la habilidades de "Musi" se potenciadas
**"Q"**Musi entra en modo combate y potencia su siguiente ataque basico aumentado su armadura, resistencia magica y reduciendo su alcance.
**"W"** Musi se posiciona a distancia aumentado su poder de habilidad, velocidad y alcanze su siguientes ataques basicos haran daño en area.
 **"E"** Minion se sube a carro de combate, ganando daño vida y alcance, sus ataques basicos daño y daño magico.
 **"R"** Minion sube a su maquina destruye nexus, ganando daño vida resistencia y armadura.
**aliados: ** {{champion:12}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:427}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:114}}  
**enemigos:** {{champion:75}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:31}}{{champion:20}}{{champion:41}}      ustedes saben campeones que necesitan farmear
**skins:** se puede usar las skin de los minions como proyecto, guardinas estelares,veraniegos,aprilfools ,navideños y los apectos antiguos de lo minions;tambien que cambie de color con el equipo que el este
Interacion con campeones: 
 Nasus: este unico que no podras farmear
Tresh: no te llevaras las almas de mis hermanos
Veigar: no te daremos mas poder
Minions: "a la batalla" "levantemonos en su contra"
"Comparte nuestro ideales o muere" 
Con campeones capaces de curar minions: "gracias señor(ita) estaremos agradecidos"
Irven: "compartimos los mismos ideales pero diferentes camino"
Construcciones:
-torretas:"un obstáculo menos"
Inhibidor:"nos haremos mas fuertes"


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
maybe we need a champion minion

-abilities:
Passive:

Allied minions near Musi are inspired by his leadership, making them go on a frenzy during battle, with increased stats depending on their type up to 1/3/6 points. Fuyuki`s abilities are empowered in sight of how many minions are nearby.

Q:

Musi acquires a combat stace, enhancing his next basic attack, increasing his armor and magic resist and reducing his range.

W:

Musi places himself further from the enemy, gaining ranged attacks and giving them a splash damage effect, as well as increasing his attack speed and ability power.

E:

Hops on top of a war chariot, gaining bonus attack damage, range and health. His auto attacks deal additional magic damage.

R:

Rides on his nexus-busting machine, obtaining bonus attack damage and resistances.

allies:{{champion:12}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:427}} 
enemies:{{champion:75}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:31}}{{champion:41}}   you know champions need farm
skins: you can use the skins of minions as a project , stellar guardinas, summery, aprilfools, Christmas and old aspects of the minions, also change color with the team this
You have the same idea or you know someone, share

Tienes la misma idea o conoces alguien,comparte y si es ingles de google

-eldanmasterXD(pasiva)
-FallenDemonX(passive)
http://boards.lan.leagueoflegends.com/es/c/creaciones-de-la-comunidad/ZrRTd9Eg-un-minion-como-campeon
http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Minion

replies.body: Pero si Veigar ya parece un minion, sólo le falta una skin que diga "Veigar Minion"

Permiteme:


Passive:

Allied minions near Fuyuki are inspired by his leadership, making them go on a frenzy during battle, with increased stats depending on their type up to 1/3/6 points. Fuyuki`s abilities are empowered in sight of how many minions are nearby.

Q:

Fuyuki acquires a combat stace, enhancing his next basic attack, increasing his armor and magic resist and reducing his range.

W:

Fuyuki places himself further from the enemy, gaining ranged attacks and giving them a splash damage effect, as well as increasing his attack speed and ability power.

E:

Hops on top of a war chariot, gaining bonus attack damage, range and health. His auto attacks deal additional magic damage.

R:

Rides on his nexus-busting machine, obtaining bonus attack damage and resistances.
